overview: Watch these four young artists in their creative crisis struggling to find inspiration. This tricky situation asks for a creative solution. Letting go of everything that limits you in the expression of yourself - clothes for example - seems to be the way to go. This is the story of A TASTE OF KUNST, an explicit adult series about the connection between art and sex, fame and desire, that portrays the difficulty of re-engaging with life. Starring Skye Blue, Ariana Van, Tula, Romeo, and Doryann
title: A Taste of Kunst 2
